intro: Hello, I am Erphan Desai. The Chief Fire Auditor for BMC and the Technical Director for Eurekha FireTech Private Limited, a company based out of Mumbai. I assess and help organizations and governments to bringout the risks and issues with their investments in Fire Detection and Protecttion. See my ways of working below:

images.title: Getting Started
images.description:
You can get started by typing,
 1. 'intro' to get an intro of SPN.
 2. 'aaas' to understand the offering Austomation as a Service.
 3. 'join event' to join any upcoming event/meeting.
 4. 'incident report' to bring up the daily incident chart, and then type 'start sod' to start the SoD.
 5. 'canvas' to get into creative programming, type 'canvas' again to get back to workbench view.

Good Luck and Have a wonderful time.
